By equipping ` S u. { P } ` for some ` P e/ S ` with the particular point topology, we can show that ` P ` is in the closure of ` S ` ; hence the sequence ` P ( x ) ` is in the product of the closures, and we can utilize this instance of ~ ptcls to extract an element of the closure of ` X_ k e.
